fields.name: view
fields.label: View
fields.description: Toggle between the various page layout types: 1 = List, 2 = Compact, 3 = Card

fields.name: hero_media
fields.label: Hero Media
fields.description: Hero image (optional). Enter filename of an image in the `static/img/` folder.

fields.name: background
fields.label: Background
fields.description: Apply a background color, gradient, or image.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Image
fields.description: The filename of image in the `static/img/` folder

fields.name: image_darken
fields.label: Image Darken
fields.description: Darken the image? Range 0-1 where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque, in steps of 0.1

fields.name: image_parallax
fields.label: Image Parallax
fields.description: Use a fun parallax-like fixed background effect?

fields.name: image_min_height
fields.label: Image Min Height
fields.decsription: The minimum size of the image, e.g. 500px

fields.name: text_color_light
fields.label: Text Colour Light
fields.description: Invert the colour of the Text over the image

fields.name: cta
fields.label: Call to Action
fields.description: Call to action links. Display link(s) by specifying a URL and label. Icon is optional.

fields.name: image_darken
fields.label: Image Darken
fields.description: Darken the image? Range 0-1 where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque, in steps of 0.1

fields.name: exclude_future
fields.label: Exclude workshops dated in the future

fields.name: image_darken
fields.label: Image Darken
fields.description: Darken the image? Range 0-1 where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque, in steps of 0.1

fields.name: date
fields.label: Date
fields.description: The date on which the workshop will be held

fields.name: endDate
fields.label: End Date
fields.description: Leave blank unless this is a multi-day course

fields.name: publishDate
fields.label: Publish Date
fields.description: the date the workshop should be publicised

fields.name: places
fields.label: Places
fields.description: The number of available places on the workshop

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured
fields.description: You can filter by featured content on your homepage

fields.name: bio
fields.label: Bio
fields.description: A short bio displyed in user profile at end of posts. Between 10 and 700 characters long.

fields.name: email
fields.label: Email
fields.description: Enter email to display Gravatar (if Gravatar enabled in Config)

fields.label: Image Darken
fields.description: Darken the image? Range 0-1 where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque, in steps of 0.1

fields.description: Darken the image? Range 0-1 where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque, in steps of 0.1

fields.name: padding
fields.label: Padding
fields.description: Customize the section spacing. Order is top, right, bottom, left.
